feed.title: Pividori Lab
feed.subtitle: We are a research laboratory at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. We design advanced machine learning methods applied to human disease with a systems biology approach.

entry.title: Initializing Pividori Lab
entry.content:
On May 1st, 2023, I’ll officially start as an Assistant Professor and PI of the Pividori Lab in the Department of Biomedical Informatics, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. I won’t write a long post about this, just saying that I’m very excited about this new stage in my career. I invite you to keep an eye on this blog, my Twitter and our projects on GitHub for updates about our research and other activities.

We are recruiting! So if your interests overlap with our labs’, please reach out!
